snippet: KAHN--Julius. A veteran of the coffee industry for over 60 years, died Sunday, July 3, age 88, surrounded by his children, Debbie Kahn, Karen and Jeff Miller and Jason Kahn. He is survived by his grandchildren, Stephanie, Katie and Melanie Miller....
lead_paragraph: KAHN--Julius. A veteran of the coffee industry for over 60 years, died Sunday, July 3, age 88, surrounded by his children, Debbie Kahn, Karen and Jeff Miller and Jason Kahn. He is survived by his grandchildren, Stephanie, Katie and Melanie Miller. His loving wife Isabel predeceased him in 2012. A celebration of his life will be at Brotherhood Synagogue, 28 Gramercy Park South, Sunday, July 10, at 11am. Lunch following services. Shiva at 130 E. 18 St., apt. 17d, Sunday 3-5pm, 6-9pm and Monday 1-8pm. Donations can be made to BCRFcure.org 1/3
